experience.title: Frontend Web Developer
experience.description: In this role I leverage PHP, Javascript and Bootstrap to create custom Wordpress themes for our clients which are fully functional and responsive. I am also responsible for updating and maintaining a number of websites on a monthly basis.

experience.title: Frontend Web Developer
experience.description: I worked on a redesign project creating a fully responsive frontend SPA built with Laravel, Vue and Vuex that integrated with a Laravel backend. It used Axios to call the backend API and Bulma as the CSS framework. It included a registration form, token based authentication and an account dashboard for authorized users.

experience.title: Freelance Web Developer
experience.description: I created and maintained fully responsive websites using PHP, Vue, Laravel and Javascript, along with Bootstrap and MySQL.
